item.title: Graham Scan algorithm for convex hulls
item.description: Have you ever wanted to compute the outer boundary of a bunch of scattered points? Maybe you have data in point cloud form from an object scan and want to detect the outer perimeter. In this post, we will take a look at an efficient way of computing the so-called convex hull of a set of points in 2D. Convex Hull A convex hull is a convex polygon that encloses all the points in a point set.
